required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Potential Causes of Retained Items During Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Potential Causes of Retained Items During Surgery

lead_sponsor.agency: Imam Mohammad ibn Saud Islamic University

clinical_study.source: Imam Mohammad ibn Saud Islamic University

brief_summary.textblock: to understand and analyze the potential causes of retained items (sponge and instruments) during surgery, which include room preparations, initial count, adding sponges, removing sponges, first closing count, final closing count.

primary_outcome.measure: study potential causes of retained item during surgery
primary_outcome.description: to understand participant opinion about the potential causes of retained item which include :room preparation with needed operating room equipment according to the specialty, initial count of sponges and instruments, adding sponges by event recording in a chart, removing sponges by event recording in a chart, first closing count in a chart , final closing count in a chart.

study_pop.textblock: an online survey will be send through cluster administration to operating room staff ,to answer voluntarily without compensation. informed consent was obtained. This study was exempt from review board approval at authors' institutions.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
• operating room staff of hail hospital cluster
Exclusion Criteria:
• none

overall_official.affiliation: imam mohamamd ibn saud islamic university

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Imam Mohammad ibn Saud Islamic University
